name: Fictional Mountain Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner Tolkien! Need a majestic moniker for that towering peak in your fantasy world? Look no further. This generator crafts epic mountain names that will leave your readers breathless.
introduction: Every great fantasy world needs towering mountains with names that echo through the ages. But coming up with the perfect name can be harder than scaling Everest! This generator combines powerful prefixes and evocative suffixes to create names worthy of the most legendary peaks. Get ready to name mountains that inspire awe and wonder!
howToUse: Marvel at the majestic mountain name that appears.
If it's not quite right, hit 'Generate' again! We've got enough combinations to make K2 jealous.
Copy and paste your favorite name into your story, game, or world-building project. Instant epicness!
Share your creation with the world! (Or at least your friends.)

faqs.question: Can I use these names in my book/game/whatever?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! These names are yours to command. Go forth and create!

faqs.question: Are the names copyrighted?
faqs.answer: Nope! They're fresh out of the generator, ready for your creative touch. Consider them open-source mountains.

faqs.question: How many names can I generate?
faqs.answer: As many as your heart desires! We're not stopping you. In fact, we encourage it. Name all the mountains!

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! With countless combinations, you're bound to find a name that resonates with your inner mountaineer. Or, you know, tweak one of the generated names to make it your own!

faqs.question: Will this generator help me climb real mountains?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. This generator is purely for fictional mountain naming purposes. For actual mountain climbing, please consult a qualified mountaineer and bring lots of snacks.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send them our way, and we might just add them to the generator's arsenal.
